name: Strapless Dress, Custom Made
description:
Gorgeous strapless dress with elastic top seam and waist seam. Half circular skirt for that amazing twirl and a belt to top it all off.


#1 Give a guide to what sort of pattern you are after
Stripey, spotty, hearts, floral, vintagey, cottagey, cutesie, earthy, pastel, vibrant, dark, geometric etc

#2 Give a guide to what sort of colour you are after
Pastels, darks, brights, reds, browns, blues etc

#3 Choose your size
Size 4     55cm long (from waist seam), 67-75cm waist
Size 6     55cm long (from waist seam), 71-79cm waist
Size 8     60cm long (from waist seam), 75-83cm waist
Size 10   60cm long (from waist seam), 79-87cm waist
Size 12   65cm long (from waist seam), 83-91cm waist
Size 14   65cm long (from waist seam), 87-95cm waist
If you would fit into two sizes it is up to you whether you like it a bit tighter or a bit looser at the waist.

#4 Please provide your bust measurement, use a bendable tape measure to circle around your bust at the biggest point.
Please provide your upper bust measurement, use a bendable tape measure to circle around the top of your bust, where you want to top elastic to sit.
This way I can alter the bodice to fit you best.

Please provide these details in the comments sections after checkout. I will send you an email within a few days to confirm and give you pattern options for your dress.

Please allow up to three weeks for your order to be completed, it will usually only take one week. Alternatively, if you are in a dress crisis and need it now, after completing your order send me a message on 0411 528 931 so I can have it sewn for you as soon as possible.

name: Classic Skirt, Custom Made Organic Cotton
description:
Classic Lust Not Want Not Skirt with wide waist band, elastic back and deep pockets. Super comfortable, fun and easy. Made with organic cotton, meaning the cotton plant was not subjected to chemicals and pesticides and is much better for the environment as conventional cotton uses a LOT of these.


#1 Choose your size
Size 4     -   38cm long, 67-75cm waist or where you wear it
Size 6     -   40cm long, 71-79cm waist or where you wear it
Size 8     -   41cm long, 75-83cm waist or where you wear it
Size 10   -   42cm long, 79-87cm waist or where you wear it
Size 12   -   44cm long, 83-91cm waist or where you wear it
Size 14   -   45cm long, 87-95cm waist or where you wear it
If you would fit into two sizes it is up to you whether you like it a bit tighter or a bit looser at the waistband.

#2 Choose your style
A - All patterned / one colour
B - Patterned waistband with coloured pockets and skirt
C - Coloured waistband with patterned pockets and skirt
D - Coloured waistband and pockets with patterned skirt
E - Patterned waistband and pockets with coloured skirt

#3 Give a guide to what sort of pattern you are after
Stripey, spotty, hearts, floral, vintagey, cottagey, cutesie, earthy, pastel, vibrant, dark, geometric etc

#4 Give a guide to what sort of colour you are after
Pastels, darks, brights, reds, browns, blues etc

Please provide these details in the comments sections after checkout. I will send you an email within a few days to confirm and give you pattern options for your skirt.

Please allow up to three weeks for your order to be completed, though it will usually only take one week. Alternatively, if you are in a skirt crisis and need it now, after completing your order send me a message on 0411 528 931 so I can have it sewn for you as soon as possible.

name: Lusty Tee, Organic Cotton
description: Made in Brisbane from beautifully soft organic cotton and screen printed with the Lusty Logo
